message.entry: When Method is set to ''Canny'', the Threshold property must be set to a 2-element vector of low and high values of MATLAB builtin numeric data type that define the weak and strong edges.
When Method is set to ''Sobel'', ''Prewitt'' or ''Roberts'', the Threshold property must be set to a scalar numeric value that is within the range of the input data type.
At least one of BinaryImageOutputPort or GradientComponentOutputPorts properties must be set to true.
